item.name: Auratouched Mage
item.text: When Auratouched Mage enters the battlefield, search your library for an Aura card that could enchant it. If Auratouched Mage is still on the battlefield, put that Aura card onto the battlefield attached to it. Otherwise, reveal the Aura card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Bathe in Light
item.text: Radiance — Choose a color. Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Truth shines even in darkness. Those who march on the side of truth walk always in righteous light."

item.name: Benevolent Ancestor
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
item.flavorText: Although the door is flimsy and the lock pathetically small, Josuri's family never fears the night outside.

item.name: Blazing Archon
item.text: Flying Creatures can't attack you.
item.flavorText: "Through the haze of battle I saw the glint of sun on golden mane, the sheen of glory clad in mail, and I dropped my sword and wept at the idiocy of war." —Dravin, Gruul deserter

item.name: Boros Fury-Shield
item.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking or blocking creature this turn. If {R} was spent to cast Boros Fury-Shield, it deals damage to that creature's controller equal to the creature's power.

item.name: Caregiver
item.text: {W}, Sacrifice a creature: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
item.flavorText: "The guilds each believe its way is right, but their ways only bring blood to Ravnica's streets and tears to Ravnica's families."

item.name: Chant of Vitu-Ghazi
item.text: Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) Prevent all damage that would be dealt by creatures this turn. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

item.name: Concerted Effort
item.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, all creatures you control gain flying until end of turn if a creature you control has flying. The same is true for fear, first strike, double strike, landwalk, protection, trample, and vigilance.

item.name: Conclave Equenaut
item.text: Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) Flying
item.flavorText: Equenauts are the seeds of the Conclave, scattered on the four winds, searching for new places to take root.

item.name: Conclave Phalanx
item.text: Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) When Conclave Phalanx enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

item.name: Conclave's Blessing
item.text: Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 for each other creature you control.

item.name: Courier Hawk
item.text: Flying, vigilance
item.flavorText: The Orzhov started using hawks as messengers in order to bypass the many toll roads and bridges that dot Ravnica. Soon the service became one of their most profitable businesses.

item.name: Devouring Light
item.text: Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) Exile target attacking or blocking creature.
item.flavorText: Into the light the good are welcomed, and with the light the evil are banished.

item.name: Divebomber Griffin
item.text: Flying {T}, Sacrifice Divebomber Griffin: Divebomber Griffin deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
item.flavorText: Justice flies swiftly on angry wings.

item.name: Dromad Purebred
item.text: Whenever Dromad Purebred is dealt damage, you gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: "I have seen much from the back of my dromad, most of it terribly wrong. The more I see, the more I am convinced of the rightness of my path." —Heruj, Selesnya initiate

item.name: Faith's Fetters
item.text: Enchant permanent When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. Enchanted permanent's activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities. If enchanted permanent is a creature, it can't attack or block.

item.name: Festival of the Guildpact
item.text: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: Everyone knows that violence at the Festival brings the worst of luck, so for at least one day a year arms are laid down in favor of brimming goblets.

item.name: Flickerform
item.text: Enchant creature {2}{W}{W}: Exile enchanted creature and all Auras attached to it. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, return those Auras to the battlefield under their owners' control attached to that creature.

item.name: Gate Hound
item.text: Creatures you control have vigilance as long as Gate Hound is enchanted.
item.flavorText: "Ditri, I leave this checkpoint in your capable teeth." —Kitov, nightguard patrol

item.name: Ghosts of the Innocent
item.text: If a source would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals half that damage, rounded down, to that creature or player instead.
item.flavorText: "Ma said we should offer up blini-cakes and salt to the good ones, but I get that chill up my spine and just shut the door." —Otak, Tin Street shopkeep

item.name: Hour of Reckoning
item.text: Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) Destroy all nontoken creatures.
item.flavorText: "Ravnica, like a hedge, must be pruned, leaving only leaves of verdant uniformity." —Niszka, Selesnya evangel

item.name: Hunted Lammasu
item.text: Flying When Hunted Lammasu enters the battlefield, put a 4/4 black Horror creature token onto the battlefield under target opponent's control.
item.flavorText: The lammasu ruled the velds before the city grew. Now they roam Ravnica's skies, but their ancient enemies have not forgotten them.

item.name: Leave No Trace
item.text: Radiance — Destroy target enchantment and each other enchantment that shares a color with it.
item.flavorText: The magic of the Boros patrols the streets even when their soldiers do not.

item.name: Light of Sanction
item.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control by sources you control.
item.flavorText: The Legion looks after its own.

item.name: Loxodon Gatekeeper
item.text: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
item.flavorText: The gatekeepers are so fastidious that even the winds must wait to pass.

item.name: Nightguard Patrol
item.text: First strike, vigilance
item.flavorText: "The Wojek defend the laws. We defend the people."

item.name: Oathsworn Giant
item.text: Vigilance Other creatures you control get +0/+2 and have vigilance.
item.flavorText: The town stands on his ancestors' former burial grounds. Even with the graves long gone, he continues his determined vigil.

item.name: Sandsower
item.text: Tap three untapped creatures you control: Tap target creature.
item.flavorText: It drifts through the streets as a breeze of collective sighs, wilting the bustle with dreams and heavy eyelids.

item.name: Screeching Griffin
item.text: Flying {R}: Target creature can't block Screeching Griffin this turn.
item.flavorText: They were master fishers, but their seas are now the streets and their catch, the goblins that run pell-mell from the screeching in the sky.

item.name: Seed Spark
item.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If {G} was spent to cast Seed Spark, put two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "If you ask me, those root-lovers value mindless dogma over progress." —Trivaz, Izzet mage

item.name: Suppression Field
item.text: Activated abilities cost {2} more to activate unless they're mana abilities.
item.flavorText: The most feared of Azorius punishments is to be freed—sent back out into the world, stripped of all magical defenses.

item.name: Three Dreams
item.text: Search your library for up to three Aura cards with different names, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: "Choose one to heal, one to harm, and one to grant you the prudence to use them." —Miotri, auratouched mage

item.name: Twilight Drover
item.text: Whenever a creature token leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Twilight Drover. {2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Twilight Drover: Put two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.

item.name: Veteran Armorer
item.text: Other creatures you control get +0/+1.
item.flavorText: "Give me a sword and I'll kill a few enemies. But give me a hammer and a fiery forge, and I'll turn the tide of battle."

item.name: Votary of the Conclave
item.text: {2}{G}: Regenerate Votary of the Conclave.
item.flavorText: An ageless order, the votaries receive the gift of rejuvenation from the temple gardens they guard.

item.name: Wojek Apothecary
item.text: Radiance — {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it this turn.
item.flavorText: "A few arrows aren't enough to pierce your faith, soldier. You'll be back on the battlefield by sun's dawn."

item.name: Wojek Siren
item.text: Radiance — Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it get +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: It is the call to arms, the call to fury, the call to blood.

item.name: Belltower Sphinx
item.text: Flying Whenever a source deals damage to Belltower Sphinx, that source's controller puts that many cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

item.name: Cerulean Sphinx
item.text: Flying {U}: Cerulean Sphinx's owner shuffles it into his or her library.
item.flavorText: "About the sphinx, I have mixed feelings. Their wisdom I crave, but their secrecy I can't tolerate." —Szadek

item.name: Compulsive Research
item.text: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless he or she discards a land card.
item.flavorText: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"

item.name: Convolute
item.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.
item.flavorText: The words came to the sorcerer's lips but refused to budge any further.

item.name: Copy Enchantment
item.text: You may have Copy Enchantment enter the battlefield as a copy of any enchantment on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Simic mages create redundant backups of their experiments to reduce the consequences of catastrophe.

item.name: Dizzy Spell
item.text: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Drake Familiar
item.text: Flying When Drake Familiar enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an enchantment to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "Falconry? A fine sport I suppose, if you're attracted to the frailty of birds." —Trivaz, Izzet mage

item.name: Dream Leash
item.text: Enchant permanent You can't choose an untapped permanent as Dream Leash's target as you cast Dream Leash. You control enchanted permanent.
item.flavorText: The tendrils of sorcery find easy purchase on the soft underbelly of dreams.

item.name: Drift of Phantasms
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Ethereal Usher
item.text: {U}, {T}: Target creature is unblockable this turn. Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Eye of the Storm
item.text: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery card, exile it. Then that player copies each instant or sorcery card exiled with Eye of the Storm. For each copy, the player may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

item.name: Flight of Fancy
item.text: Enchant creature When Flight of Fancy enters the battlefield, draw two cards. Enchanted creature has flying.
item.flavorText: The view from above is an inspiration to the newly winged.

item.name: Flow of Ideas
item.text: Draw a card for each Island you control.
item.flavorText: "A system to direct the flow of Ravnica's entire water supply? Thinking a bit small, aren't we?" —Trivaz, Izzet mage

item.name: Followed Footsteps
item.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, put a token that's a copy of enchanted creature onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Æther can turn a footprint into a blueprint.

item.name: Grayscaled Gharial
item.text: Islandwalk
item.flavorText: Each tooth carries enough bacteria to kill a person in a day or two. But then, gharials do have 138 teeth.

item.name: Grozoth
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Grozoth enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards that have converted mana cost 9, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library. {4}: Grozoth loses defender until end of turn. Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Halcyon Glaze
item.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, Halcyon Glaze becomes a 4/4 Illusion creature with flying until end of turn. It's still an enchantment.
item.flavorText: "Earth to æther, window to wonder, stillness to the sky." —Glazing incantation

item.name: Hunted Phantasm
item.text: Hunted Phantasm is unblockable. When Hunted Phantasm enters the battlefield, put five 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield under target opponent's control.

item.name: Induce Paranoia
item.text: Counter target spell. If {B} was spent to cast Induce Paranoia, that spell's controller puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the spell's converted mana cost.

item.name: Lore Broker
item.text: {T}: Each player draws a card, then discards a card.
item.flavorText: Lies are sold as often as truths—and used just as effectively.

item.name: Mark of Eviction
item.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, return enchanted creature and all Auras attached to that creature to their owners' hands.
item.flavorText: Tharashk the Bold suddenly wasn't himself. Or anyone else, for that matter.

item.name: Mnemonic Nexus
item.text: Each player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.
item.flavorText: True enlightenment comes not with a new thought, but with understanding of all the old ones.

item.name: Muddle the Mixture
item.text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Peel from Reality
item.text: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.
item.flavorText: When House Dimir's secrets are in danger of exposure, the guild takes drastic measures to cover its tracks.

item.name: Quickchange
item.text: Target creature becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: Most Ravnicans lead lives of desperate survival. Those who thrive are malleable enough to change with the ever-shifting politics of the guilds.

item.name: Remand
item.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it into its owner's hand instead of into that player's graveyard. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "Well, at least all of that arm-waving and arcane babbling you did was impressive."

item.name: Snapping Drake
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: The irritable drakes are solitary nesters. Even brooding females barely contain the urge to attack their own young.

item.name: Spawnbroker
item.text: When Spawnbroker enters the battlefield, you may exchange control of target creature you control and target creature with power less than or equal to that creature's power an opponent controls.
item.flavorText: "The trick isn't setting up the bad trade. It's making each side think it got the better deal."

item.name: Stasis Cell
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. {3}{U}: Attach Stasis Cell to target creature.
item.flavorText: The Simic created the cells to preserve their experiments. The Azorius put the cells to use on the guilty.

item.name: Surveilling Sprite
item.text: Flying When Surveilling Sprite is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may draw a card.
item.flavorText: Their natural curiosity, combined with a knack for trespassing, makes sprites excellent spies.

item.name: Tattered Drake
item.text: Flying {B}: Regenerate Tattered Drake.
item.flavorText: "Drakes embody the worst of Ravnica: great potential, twisted by selfishness and greed." —Razia

item.name: Telling Time
item.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.
item.flavorText: Mastery is achieved when "telling time" becomes "telling time what to do."

item.name: Terraformer
item.text: {1}: Choose a basic land type. Each land you control becomes that type until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "This feels a little more like home."

item.name: Tidewater Minion
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {4}: Tidewater Minion loses defender until end of turn. {T}: Untap target permanent.

item.name: Tunnel Vision
item.text: Name a card. Target player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until the named card is revealed. If it is, that player puts the rest of the revealed cards into his or her graveyard and puts the named card on top of his or her library. Otherwise, the player shuffles his or her library.

item.name: Vedalken Dismisser
item.text: When Vedalken Dismisser enters the battlefield, put target creature on top of its owner's library.
item.flavorText: "I crept up on him, quiet as a guttermouse. And then suddenly I found myself facedown in a latrine pit behind Tin Street Market." —Sirislav, Dimir spy

item.name: Vedalken Entrancer
item.text: {U}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
item.flavorText: Their denial reaches far into your future.

item.name: Wizened Snitches
item.text: Flying Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed.
item.flavorText: "Be careful what information you ask them to find, for it will likely be the subject of tale time at the alehouse." —Sirislav, Dimir spy

item.name: Zephyr Spirit
item.text: When Zephyr Spirit blocks, return it to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: A spiteful force exists on Ravnica that binds these ghosts to the land of the living but forbids them to touch it.

item.name: Blood Funnel
item.text: Noncreature spells you cast cost {2} less to cast. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, counter that spell unless you sacrifice a creature.

item.name: Brainspoil
item.text: Destroy target creature that isn't enchanted. It can't be regenerated. Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Carrion Howler
item.text: Pay 1 life: Carrion Howler gets +2/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: They chase tirelessly after the bone-carts that speed along the streets of the Plague Quarter.

item.name: Clinging Darkness
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -4/-1.
item.flavorText: There's an experience worse than blindness—it's the certainty that your vision is perfect and the horror that there's no world around you to see.

item.name: Dark Confidant
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
item.flavorText: Greatness, at any cost.

item.name: Darkblast
item.text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

item.name: Dimir House Guard
item.text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Dimir House Guard. Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Dimir Machinations
item.text: Look at the top three cards of target player's library. Exile any number of those cards, then put the rest back in any order. Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Disembowel
item.text: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost X.
item.flavorText: "We thought we found the victim's clothes lumped in the street. As it turned out, it was the victim, insides sucked out—just a sack of skin and robes." —Agrus Kos

item.name: Empty the Catacombs
item.text: Each player returns all creature cards from his or her graveyard to his or her hand.
item.flavorText: When the dead are laid to rest in Ravnica, it's usually just a nap.

item.name: Golgari Thug
item.text: When Golgari Thug is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. Dredge 4 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly four cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

item.name: Helldozer
item.text: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target land. If that land was nonbasic, untap Helldozer.
item.flavorText: Sometimes you go to hell, and sometimes hell comes to you.

item.name: Hex
item.text: Destroy six target creatures.
item.flavorText: When killing five just isn't enough.

item.name: Hunted Horror
item.text: Trample When Hunted Horror enters the battlefield, put two 3/3 green Centaur creature tokens with protection from black onto the battlefield under target opponent's control.

item.name: Infectious Host
item.text: When Infectious Host is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, target player loses 2 life.
item.flavorText: "Lost man, dead man, knocking on the door. Cankerman, soreman, knock no more." —Ravnican children's rhyme

item.name: Keening Banshee
item.text: Flying When Keening Banshee enters the battlefield, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Her cold wail echoes in the alleys and under-eaves, finding the unfortunate and turning their blood to ice.

item.name: Last Gasp
item.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Allow me a moment to catch your breath."

item.name: Mausoleum Turnkey
item.text: When Mausoleum Turnkey enters the battlefield, return target creature card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: When he reaches for his key ring, you should be running for the exit.

item.name: Moonlight Bargain
item.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. For each card, put that card into your graveyard unless you pay 2 life. Then put the rest into your hand.
item.flavorText: At every fifth full moon, the Moon Market convenes to peddle Ravnica's most forbidden wares.

item.name: Mortipede
item.text: {2}{G}: All creatures able to block Mortipede this turn do so.
item.flavorText: Mortipede pheromones choke the streets with sickly sweetness, luring the rash and unwary into its waiting jaws.

item.name: Necromantic Thirst
item.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.name: Necroplasm
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Necroplasm. At the beginning of your end step, destroy each creature with converted mana cost equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on Necroplasm. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

item.name: Netherborn Phalanx
item.text: When Netherborn Phalanx enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life for each creature he or she controls. Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Nightmare Void
item.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

item.name: Ribbons of Night
item.text: Ribbons of Night deals 4 damage to target creature and you gain 4 life. If {U} was spent to cast Ribbons of Night, draw a card.
item.flavorText: "My favorite meal is angel's flesh, slain in agony and iced with black vinegar." —Aszala of House Dimir

item.name: Roofstalker Wight
item.text: {1}{U}: Roofstalker Wight gains flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: No heartbeat to hear, no greed to bribe, no fear of death.

item.name: Sadistic Augermage
item.text: When Sadistic Augermage is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each player puts a card from his or her hand on top of his or her library.
item.flavorText: "Don't worry. I know the drill."

item.name: Sewerdreg
item.text: Swampwalk Sacrifice Sewerdreg: Exile target card from a graveyard.
item.flavorText: They hardly have form, dripping through pipe and grate with the slip and stench of flowing sewage.

item.name: Shred Memory
item.text: Exile up to four target cards from a single graveyard. Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Sins of the Past
item.text: Until end of turn, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that card would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead. Exile Sins of the Past.

item.name: Stinkweed Imp
item.text: Flying Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly five cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

item.name: Strands of Undeath
item.text: Enchant creature When Strands of Undeath enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards. {B}: Regenerate enchanted creature.
item.flavorText: "Why limit yourself to mortal law when you can outlive those who enforce it?" —Czaric, Orzhov prelate

item.name: Thoughtpicker Witch
item.text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Look at the top two cards of target opponent's library, then exile one of them.
item.flavorText: "Once the brew gets the brains nice and pickled, they're a lot easier to pick through."

item.name: Undercity Shade
item.text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) {B}: Undercity Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Officially, there's nothing under that bridge to hunt . . . Unofficially, my torchers are too terrified to go there after nightfall." —Agrus Kos

item.name: Vigor Mortis
item.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If {G} was spent to cast Vigor Mortis, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
item.flavorText: After fear and weakness rot away, that which remains is stronger than its living form.

item.name: Vindictive Mob
item.text: When Vindictive Mob enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature. Vindictive Mob can't be blocked by Saprolings.
item.flavorText: Many minds, a single madness.

item.name: Woebringer Demon
item.text: Flying At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature. If the player can't, sacrifice Woebringer Demon.
item.flavorText: Each soul he devours adds its hunger to his own.

item.name: Barbarian Riftcutter
item.text: {R}, Sacrifice Barbarian Riftcutter: Destroy target land.
item.flavorText: "Riftcutters are suicidal anarchists, waving those lightning axes around so much that the walls are as likely to fall as their foes." —Heruj, Selesnya initiate

item.name: Blockbuster
item.text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice Blockbuster: Blockbuster deals 3 damage to each tapped creature and each player.
item.flavorText: Vendors hung cords heavy with roots and laid out boxes of salted meat, unaware of the fiery disaster swiftly approaching.

item.name: Breath of Fury
item.text: Enchant creature you control When enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it and attach Breath of Fury to a creature you control. If you do, untap all creatures you control and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

item.name: Char
item.text: Char deals 4 damage to target creature or player and 2 damage to you.
item.flavorText: Izzet mages often acquire their magic reagents from dubious sources, so the potency of their spells is never predictable.

item.name: Cleansing Beam
item.text: Radiance — Cleansing Beam deals 2 damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.
item.flavorText: "Justice is toothless without punishment. Righteousness cannot succeed without the suffering of the guilty." —Razia

item.name: Coalhauler Swine
item.text: Whenever Coalhauler Swine is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to each player.
item.flavorText: Nothing stops industry in Ravnica—certainly not the safety of its workers.

item.name: Dogpile
item.text: Dogpile deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of attacking creatures you control.
item.flavorText: There is no shelter from this storm, its rain of fists, or the thunderous cackles of bloodlust.

item.name: Excruciator
item.text: Damage that would be dealt by Excruciator can't be prevented.
item.flavorText: "Though used as a piercing weapon, the tusk is more akin to a stinger, spreading pain instantly throughout the body of its victim. This specimen deserves further study." —Simic research notes

item.name: Fiery Conclusion
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Fiery Conclusion, sacrifice a creature. Fiery Conclusion deals 5 damage to target creature.
item.flavorText: The Boros legionnaire saw a noble sacrifice, the Rakdos thug a blazing suicide, and the Izzet alchemist an experiment gone awry.

item.name: Flame Fusillade
item.text: Until end of turn, permanents you control gain "{T}: This permanent deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
item.flavorText: "A single item acting as lantern and lance? Now that's military efficiency." —Brev Grezar, Boros lieutenant

item.name: Flash Conscription
item.text: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. If {W} was spent to cast Flash Conscription, the creature gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, you gain that much life" until end of turn.

item.name: Frenzied Goblin
item.text: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
item.flavorText: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

item.name: Galvanic Arc
item.text: Enchant creature When Galvanic Arc enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Enchanted creature has first strike.

item.name: Goblin Fire Fiend
item.text: Haste Goblin Fire Fiend must be blocked if able. {R}: Goblin Fire Fiend gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.name: Goblin Spelunkers
item.text: Mountainwalk
item.flavorText: Chimney sweeps, explorers of abandoned buildings, spire climbers . . . goblin spelunkers have found countless niches within Ravnica's metropolis.

item.name: Greater Forgeling
item.text: {1}{R}: Greater Forgeling gets +3/-3 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Few have seen the inner workings of Ravnica's furnaces, but neighboring districts catch brief glimpses in the horrors that escape the flames.

item.name: Hammerfist Giant
item.text: {T}: Hammerfist Giant deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player.
item.flavorText: "Oh sure, they buy a lot of ale, but I always find myself needing to rebuild after the giants have paid a visit." —Belko, owner of Titan's Keg tavern

item.name: Hunted Dragon
item.text: Flying, haste When Hunted Dragon enters the battlefield, put three 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with first strike onto the battlefield under target opponent's control.
item.flavorText: The knights see a mighty quarry. The dragon sees breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

item.name: Incite Hysteria
item.text: Radiance — Until end of turn, target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain "This creature can't block."
item.flavorText: "The Boros say they want to bring order to Ravnica. Funny then, how well they use chaos." —Trigori, Azorius senator

item.name: Indentured Oaf
item.text: Prevent all damage that Indentured Oaf would deal to red creatures.
item.flavorText: All it knows is the difference between friend and food.

item.name: Instill Furor
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this creature unless it attacked this turn."
item.flavorText: "The Rakdos know little of technology, but they definitely know how to push buttons." —Trivaz, Izzet mage

item.name: Mindmoil
item.text: Whenever you cast a spell, put the cards in your hand on the bottom of your library in any order, then draw that many cards.
item.flavorText: "My criticism of the Izzet is that their impulse for learning seems too much like impulse and too little like learning." —Trigori, Azorius senator

item.name: Molten Sentry
item.text: As Molten Sentry enters the battlefield, flip a coin. If the coin comes up heads, Molten Sentry enters the battlefield as a 5/2 creature with haste. If it comes up tails, Molten Sentry enters the battlefield as a 2/5 creature with defender.
item.flavorText: Some take after their father, Stone, some after their mother, Fire.

item.name: Ordruun Commando
item.text: {W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Ordruun Commando this turn.
item.flavorText: Thick of muscle, stout of heart, and possessing a burning love of justice and the battlefield, the Ordruun minotaurs are the foundation of the Boros Legion.

item.name: Rain of Embers
item.text: Rain of Embers deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
item.flavorText: There's plenty to talk about in the marketplaces of Ravnica, be it the latest feud between guilds or the terrible weather.

item.name: Reroute
item.text: Change the target of target activated ability with a single target. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.) Draw a card.
item.flavorText: Three hundred years of practice thwarted by an instant of mischief.

item.name: Sabertooth Alley Cat
item.text: Sabertooth Alley Cat attacks each turn if able. {1}{R}: Creatures without defender can't block Sabertooth Alley Cat this turn.
item.flavorText: It has eight lives' worth of hunger to satisfy.

item.name: Seismic Spike
item.text: Destroy target land. Add {R}{R} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Natural disasters in Ravnica are largely nullified by the Izzet. Unnatural disasters, on the other hand, happen all of the time.

item.name: Sell-Sword Brute
item.text: When Sell-Sword Brute is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to you.
item.flavorText: "Killing is easy. Just wrap your hand around the haft, and wrap your enemy around the blade."

item.name: Smash
item.text: Destroy target artifact. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: Ravnica's laws protect not its citizens but its industry. Aging equipment is destroyed rather than restored, to bring more money into the factories' coffers.

item.name: Sparkmage Apprentice
item.text: When Sparkmage Apprentice enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Pajik was amazed and pleased at his newfound powers. His pet cat Rivin was slightly less enthusiastic.

item.name: Stoneshaker Shaman
item.text: At the beginning of each player's end step, that player sacrifices an untapped land.
item.flavorText: There is no place in Ravnica for stagnation, no room for lands unfilled and untilled.

item.name: Surge of Zeal
item.text: Radiance — Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain haste until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "If only my poxes were as infectious as their zealotry." —Savra

item.name: Torpid Moloch
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Sacrifice three lands: Torpid Moloch loses defender until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Market hucksters sell molochs for use as watchdogs. Of course, that's all molochs do. Sit around . . . and watch.

item.name: Viashino Fangtail
item.text: {T}: Viashino Fangtail deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "When the bony terminus gets too large, it's shed from the tail in coinciding periods of heightened aggression and hunger." —Simic research notes

item.name: Viashino Slasher
item.text: {R}: Viashino Slasher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Citizens of Ravnica stick to the main streets. Shortcuts may look tempting, but down each alley, dozens of hungry hands await, and screams do not carry into the busy market throng.

item.name: Warp World
item.text: Each player shuffles all permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then reveals that many cards from the top of his or her library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, and land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of his or her library.

item.name: War-Torch Goblin
item.text: {R}, Sacrifice War-Torch Goblin: War-Torch Goblin deals 2 damage to target blocking creature.
item.flavorText: "In a town shaped by the subtle machinations and political intrigue of its guilds, it's reassuring to see a goblin waving his torch and screaming about some nonsense or other." —Agrus Kos

item.name: Wojek Embermage
item.text: Radiance — {T}: Wojek Embermage deals 1 damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.
item.flavorText: "Your brother's crimes are your crimes. You stood by and lent support, so you too must face judgment."

item.name: Birds of Paradise
item.text: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Long ago, birds of paradise littered the skies. Thanks to the city's sprawl, most now exist as pets of society's elite.

item.name: Bramble Elemental
item.text: Whenever an Aura becomes attached to Bramble Elemental, put two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Ravnica is a seamless urban tapestry, each city bleeding into the next. In abandoned corners, however, nature has begun to reclaim what it once owned.

item.name: Carven Caryatid
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Carven Caryatid enters the battlefield, draw a card.
item.flavorText: So-called "old wood" is rare in deforested Ravnica. Statues carved from it are said to house the last of the ancient nature spirits.

item.name: Chord of Calling
item.text: Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Civic Wayfinder
item.text: When Civic Wayfinder enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: "These alleys are not safe. Come, I can guide you back to the market square."

item.name: Doubling Season
item.text: If an effect would put one or more tokens onto the battlefield under your control, it puts twice that many of those tokens onto the battlefield instead. If an effect would place one or more counters on a permanent you control, it places twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

item.name: Dowsing Shaman
item.text: {2}{G}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: He combs the streets looking for the lost light, the discarded enigmas of the city.

item.name: Dryad's Caress
item.text: You gain 1 life for each creature on the battlefield. If {W} was spent to cast Dryad's Caress, untap all creatures you control.
item.flavorText: "I awoke to the face of beauty, my body fully healed. In that moment I knew my destiny was the Conclave's to shape." —Rogad, Selesnya initiate

item.name: Elves of Deep Shadow
item.text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.
item.flavorText: Cast out of the Conclave generations ago, these elves found a home in the corrupted districts of the Golgari.

item.name: Elvish Skysweeper
item.text: {4}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target creature with flying.
item.flavorText: The spires of Ravnica are no different from the tall trees of other planes. The elves navigate and protect them just the same.

item.name: Farseek
item.text: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

item.name: Fists of Ironwood
item.text: Enchant creature When Fists of Ironwood enters the battlefield, put two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield. Enchanted creature has trample.
item.flavorText: Saprolings add the three and the four to the "one-two punch."

item.name: Gather Courage
item.text: Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.name: Golgari Brownscale
item.text: When Golgari Brownscale is put into your hand from your graveyard, you gain 2 life. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

item.name: Golgari Grave-Troll
item.text: Golgari Grave-Troll enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Golgari Grave-Troll: Regenerate Golgari Grave-Troll. Dredge 6 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly six cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

item.name: Goliath Spider
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: The glittering strands of its complex web catch everything from a buzzing gnat to a passing bloatdrake.

item.name: Greater Mossdog
item.text: Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)
item.flavorText: Man's best fungus.

item.name: Hunted Troll
item.text: When Hunted Troll enters the battlefield, put four 1/1 blue Faerie creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield under target opponent's control. {G}: Regenerate Hunted Troll.

item.name: Ivy Dancer
item.text: {T}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Her ivy locks are a remnant of the wooded wilds now lost to Ravnica forever.

item.name: Life from the Loam
item.text: Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

item.name: Moldervine Cloak
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

item.name: Nullmage Shepherd
item.text: Tap four untapped creatures you control: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
item.flavorText: The shepherds work in secret, seeking out abominations against nature and returning them to earth and dust.

item.name: Overwhelm
item.text: Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) Creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Let the song of Selesnya be heard above the rhythm of our thundering hordes"

item.name: Perilous Forays
item.text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a land card with a basic land type and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: "This is the place? This map has got to be wrong . . . ." —Svania Trul, wayfinder novice, last words

item.name: Primordial Sage
item.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may draw a card.
item.flavorText: For each creature that arrives in its audience, the sage imparts another piece of ancient wisdom for all to hear.

item.name: Recollect
item.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: "The bones of the past will tell their tales—if you know how to speak their language." —Savra

item.name: Rolling Spoil
item.text: Destroy target land. If {B} was spent to cast Rolling Spoil, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The shadow that fell over the grove was silent yet horribly alive, roiling with millions of tiny minions dedicated to the process of rot.

item.name: Root-Kin Ally
item.text: Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) Tap two untapped creatures you control: Root-Kin Ally gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.name: Scatter the Seeds
item.text: Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) Put three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: From the seeds of faith, great forests grow.

item.name: Scion of the Wild
item.text: Scion of the Wild's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
item.flavorText: It has a hundred thousand extinctions to avenge.

item.name: Siege Wurm
item.text: Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) Trample
item.flavorText: The Rubblefield was once among the wealthiest districts in Ravnica. All it took was a single wurm to reduce it to ruins.

item.name: Stone-Seeder Hierophant
item.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, untap Stone-Seeder Hierophant. {T}: Untap target land.
item.flavorText: Her touch brings to bare stone what water and sun bring to rich soil.

item.name: Sundering Vitae
item.text: Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
item.flavorText: Centuries of wind, rain, and roots compressed into an instant of destruction: such is the power of Selesnya.

item.name: Transluminant
item.text: {W}, Sacrifice Transluminant: Put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.
item.flavorText: "Forget yourself. Forget your city. Forget your homes, your families, the debts and obligations that hold you to this world."

item.name: Trophy Hunter
item.text: {1}{G}: Trophy Hunter deals 1 damage to target creature with flying. Whenever a creature with flying dealt damage by Trophy Hunter this turn is put into a graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Trophy Hunter.

item.name: Ursapine
item.text: {G}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: A friendly ursapine means a constant supply of sharp spears. An unfriendly one means a constant supply of small holes.

item.name: Vinelasher Kudzu
item.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Vinelasher Kudzu.
item.flavorText: It grows to hate you.

item.name: Agrus Kos, Wojek Veteran
item.text: Whenever Agrus Kos, Wojek Veteran attacks, attacking red creatures get +2/+0 and attacking white creatures get +0/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Lieutenant Kos has never met a group of recruits he could not inspire or a mob he could not quell.

item.name: Autochthon Wurm
item.text: Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) Trample
item.flavorText: The trainer awoke to begin the journey from the wurm's tail to its head. The sun was setting when she arrived.

item.name: Bloodbond March
item.text: Whenever a player casts a creature spell, each player returns all cards with the same name as that spell from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.
item.flavorText: The Golgari support a vast army because death never ends its soldiers' service.

item.name: Boros Swiftblade
item.text: Double strike
item.flavorText: When the Boros Legion attacks, swiftblades enter the fray first. They pick off the archers and mages, softening the enemy front before the flame-kin and giants go in.

item.name: Brightflame
item.text: Radiance — Brightflame deals X damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
item.flavorText: "Let the pyres of the unbelievers light our way." —Razia

item.name: Chorus of the Conclave
item.text: Forestwalk As an additional cost to cast creature spells, you may pay any amount of mana. If you do, that creature enters the battlefield with that many additional +1/+1 counters on it.
item.flavorText: "We are many, yet one. We are separate in body, yet speak with a single voice. Join us in our chorus."

item.name: Circu, Dimir Lobotomist
item.text: Whenever you cast a blue spell, exile the top card of target library. Whenever you cast a black spell, exile the top card of target library. Your opponents can't cast nonland cards with the same name as a card exiled with Circu, Dimir Lobotomist.

item.name: Clutch of the Undercity
item.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Its controller loses 3 life. Transmute {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Congregation at Dawn
item.text: Search your library for up to three creature cards and reveal them. Shuffle your library, then put those cards on top of it in any order.
item.flavorText: "It is fitting that we meet in the first hour of light, for we are called by the Conclave to pierce a threat of darkness."

item.name: Consult the Necrosages
item.text: Choose one — Target player draws two cards; or target player discards two cards.
item.flavorText: Dimir rank and file never see nor hear their guildmaster. All orders are given through mysterious necrosages who appear from the shadows, tersely toss out a command, and then melt into the darkness.

item.name: Dark Heart of the Wood
item.text: Sacrifice a Forest: You gain 3 life.
item.flavorText: "The soil here is rich with the rotting dead, and the sun's fingers barely penetrate the dark canopy. Plant our brethren here. This shall be our sanctuary." —Savra

item.name: Dimir Cutpurse
item.text: Whenever Dimir Cutpurse deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you draw a card.
item.flavorText: Other guilds demand tolls from those who travel their territories, but not House Dimir. It takes its share secretly, one coin purse at a time.

item.name: Dimir Doppelganger
item.text: {1}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Dimir Doppelganger becomes a copy of that card and gains this ability.
item.flavorText: "Fear not. Your life will not go unlived."

item.name: Dimir Infiltrator
item.text: Dimir Infiltrator is unblockable. Transmute {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Drooling Groodion
item.text: {2}{B}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The Golgari expand, yes, but I refuse to call their tainted creations ‘growth.'" —Veszka, Selesnya evangel

item.name: Firemane Angel
item.text: Flying, first strike At the beginning of your upkeep, if Firemane Angel is in your graveyard or on the battlefield, you may gain 1 life. {6}{R}{R}{W}{W}: Return Firemane Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

item.name: Flame-Kin Zealot
item.text: When Flame-Kin Zealot enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Boros soldiers are like a cache of bombs ready to explode, and the flame-kin light their fuses.

item.name: Glare of Subdual
item.text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact or creature.
item.flavorText: The righteous light of Selesnya is channeled through the devout, striking out to blind the nonbelievers.

item.name: Glimpse the Unthinkable
item.text: Target player puts the top ten cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
item.flavorText: "I am confident that if anyone actually penetrates our facades, even the most perceptive would still be fundamentally unprepared for the truth of House Dimir." —Szadek

item.name: Golgari Germination
item.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: The Golgari don't bury their dead. They plant them.

item.name: Golgari Rotwurm
item.text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life.
item.flavorText: Like corpse-worms through a carapace, rotwurms slide through the hollowed bones of the undercity.

item.name: Grave-Shell Scarab
item.text: {1}, Sacrifice Grave-Shell Scarab: Draw a card. Dredge 1 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly one card from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

item.name: Guardian of Vitu-Ghazi
item.text: Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) Vigilance
item.flavorText: It stands sentinel to the great City-Tree, home of the Selesnya Conclave.

item.name: Lightning Helix
item.text: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.
item.flavorText: Though less well-known than its army of soldiers, the Boros Legion's mage-priests are as respected by the innocent as they are hated by the ghosts of the guilty.

item.name: Loxodon Hierarch
item.text: When Loxodon Hierarch enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. {G}{W}, Sacrifice Loxodon Hierarch: Regenerate each creature you control.
item.flavorText: "I have lived long, and I remember how this city once was. If my death serves to bring back the Ravnica in my memory, then so be it."

item.name: Mindleech Mass
item.text: Trample Whenever Mindleech Mass deals combat damage to a player, you may look at that player's hand. If you do, you may cast a nonland card in it without paying that card's mana cost.

item.name: Moroii
item.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.
item.flavorText: "Touched by moroii" —Undercity slang meaning "to grow old"

item.name: Perplex
item.text: Counter target spell unless its controller discards his or her hand. Transmute {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Phytohydra
item.text: If damage would be dealt to Phytohydra, put that many +1/+1 counters on it instead.
item.flavorText: "Look at this creature, so like the Conclave it serves. Cut one head and it grows two. Damage it and it flourishes." —Veszka, Selesnya evangel

item.name: Pollenbright Wings
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, put that many 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.

item.name: Psychic Drain
item.text: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard and you gain X life.
item.flavorText: "Gold can be reearned, goods restored. The moroii steal youth, more precious than either, and once gone, it's gone forever." —Berta Suszat, civic healer

item.name: Putrefy
item.text: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "All matter, animate or not, rots when exposed to time. We merely speed up the process." —Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer

item.name: Rally the Righteous
item.text: Radiance — Untap target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it. Those creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Yuri took up the ragged Boros banner, and his brethren, inspired by the act, followed him back into the fight.

item.name: Razia, Boros Archangel
item.text: Flying, vigilance, haste {T}: The next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature you control this turn is dealt to another target creature instead.
item.flavorText: Her sword burns with such brightness that foes avert their eyes and arrows divert their paths.

item.name: Razia's Purification
item.text: Each player chooses three permanents he or she controls, then sacrifices the rest.
item.flavorText: Only the chosen ones are spared.

item.name: Savra, Queen of the Golgari
item.text: Whenever you sacrifice a black creature, you may pay 2 life. If you do, each other player sacrifices a creature. Whenever you sacrifice a green creature, you may gain 2 life.
item.flavorText: "Nature's most raw beauty is the circle: perfect in its continuance, with no break between death and life."

item.name: Searing Meditation
item.text: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, Searing Meditation deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "When I meditate I see the world as it should be. All that does not fit, I remove." —Alovnek, Boros guildmage

item.name: Seeds of Strength
item.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Beneath the beauty of light and seed is the might of Vitu-Ghazi.

item.name: Selesnya Evangel
item.text: {1}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "The clamor of the city drowns all voices. But together we can sing a harmony that will resonate from Ravnica's tallest spires to her deepest wells."

item.name: Selesnya Sagittars
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Selesnya Sagittars can block an additional creature.
item.flavorText: "What's their strike range, you ask? Let's put it this way: sagittars aim their bows using maps." —Otak, Tin Street shopkeep

item.name: Shambling Shell
item.text: Sacrifice Shambling Shell: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

item.name: Sisters of Stone Death
item.text: {G}: Target creature blocks Sisters of Stone Death this turn if able. {B}{G}: Exile target creature blocking or blocked by Sisters of Stone Death. {2}{B}: Put a creature card exiled with Sisters of Stone Death onto the battlefield under your control.

item.name: Skyknight Legionnaire
item.text: Flying, haste
item.flavorText: "I do not know which gives me more pride: the legions of soldiers marching in thunderous lockstep, or the cry of the skyknights riding their rocs like jagged lightning overhead." —Razia

item.name: Sunhome Enforcer
item.text: Whenever Sunhome Enforcer deals combat damage, you gain that much life. {1}{R}: Sunhome Enforcer gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Law soothed his savage heart. Where fury once burned, the enduring flame of order now shines." —Razia

item.name: Szadek, Lord of Secrets
item.text: Flying If Szadek, Lord of Secrets would deal combat damage to a player, instead put that many +1/+1 counters on Szadek and that player puts that many cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

item.name: Thundersong Trumpeter
item.text: {T}: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.
item.flavorText: "Hear that? Those notes mean we've arrived at Sunhome Let our allies' hearts soar and our enemies' hearts shatter at the sound" —Klattic, Boros legionnaire

item.name: Tolsimir Wolfblood
item.text: Other green creatures you control get +1/+1. Other white creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Put a legendary 2/2 green and white Wolf creature token named Voja onto the battlefield.

item.name: Twisted Justice
item.text: Target player sacrifices a creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power.
item.flavorText: In Otiev's mind, he ruled in favor of the accused. But in his courtroom he was only a spectator, watching his hand deliver the sign of death.

item.name: Vulturous Zombie
item.text: Flying Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on Vulturous Zombie.
item.flavorText: "When something dies, all things benefit. Well okay, just our things." —Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer

item.name: Watchwolf
item.flavorText: Only in Ravnica do the wolves watch the flock.

item.name: Woodwraith Corrupter
item.text: {1}{B}{G}, {T}: Target Forest becomes a 4/4 black and green Elemental Horror creature. It's still a land.
item.flavorText: "Its darkened sap penetrates natural fibers and spreads its own genes. Emulation experiments are underway." —Simic research notes

item.name: Woodwraith Strangler
item.text: Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Regenerate Woodwraith Strangler.
item.flavorText: "Nothing could be more natural than roots sucking nourishment from the dead." —Savra

item.name: Boros Guildmage
item.text: ({RW} can be paid with either {R} or {W}.) {1}{R}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. {1}{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

item.name: Boros Recruit
item.text: ({RW} can be paid with either {R} or {W}.) First strike
item.flavorText: "Look at this goblin, once wild, untamed, and full of idiocy. The Boros have given him the skill of a soldier and focused his heart with a single cause." —Razia

item.name: Centaur Safeguard
item.text: ({GW} can be paid with either {G} or {W}.) When Centaur Safeguard is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may gain 3 life.
item.flavorText: Swift, strong, and selfless, the centaurs are the shields of the Conclave.

item.name: Dimir Guildmage
item.text: ({UB} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.) {3}{U}: Target player draws a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. {3}{B}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

item.name: Gaze of the Gorgon
item.text: ({BG} can be paid with either {B} or {G}.) Regenerate target creature. At end of combat, destroy all creatures that blocked or were blocked by that creature this turn.
item.flavorText: Even the dead give way to the mineral gaze of the gorgon.

item.name: Gleancrawler
item.text: ({BG} can be paid with either {B} or {G}.) Trample At the beginning of your end step, return to your hand all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

item.name: Golgari Guildmage
item.text: ({BG} can be paid with either {B} or {G}.) {4}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. {4}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

item.name: Lurking Informant
item.text: ({UB} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.) {2}, {T}: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into that player's graveyard.
item.flavorText: In the undercity, forgetfulness is often encouraged at the point of a blade.

item.name: Master Warcraft
item.text: ({RW} can be paid with either {R} or {W}.) Cast Master Warcraft only before attackers are declared. You choose which creatures attack this turn. You choose how each creature blocks this turn.

item.name: Privileged Position
item.text: ({GW} can be paid with either {G} or {W}.) Other permanents you control can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.

item.name: Selesnya Guildmage
item.text: ({GW} can be paid with either {G} or {W}.) {3}{G}: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield. {3}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.name: Shadow of Doubt
item.text: ({UB} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.) Players can't search libraries this turn. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "Your ignorance is my bliss." —Szadek

item.name: Bloodletter Quill
item.text: {2}, {T}, Put a blood counter on Bloodletter Quill: Draw a card, then lose 1 life for each blood counter on Bloodletter Quill. {U}{B}: Remove a blood counter from Bloodletter Quill.

item.name: Boros Signet
item.text: {1}, {T}: Add {R}{W} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size—a weight of strength and of pride." —Agrus Kos

item.name: Bottled Cloister
item.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, exile all cards from your hand face down. At the beginning of your upkeep, return all cards you own exiled with Bottled Cloister to your hand, then draw a card.

item.name: Cloudstone Curio
item.text: Whenever a nonartifact permanent enters the battlefield under your control, you may return another permanent you control that shares a card type with it to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: It wants to remain a mystery, banishing the curious in favor of less inquisitive company.

item.name: Crown of Convergence
item.text: Play with the top card of your library revealed. As long as the top card of your library is a creature card, creatures you control that share a color with that card get +1/+1. {G}{W}: Put the top card of your library on the bottom of your library.

item.name: Cyclopean Snare
item.text: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature, then return Cyclopean Snare to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: The spoiled, gluttonous halls of the Orzhov teem with gaudy, needless wealth. Even their security measures are made for beauty first, efficiency second.

item.name: Dimir Signet
item.text: {1}, {T}: Add {U}{B} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members—and the doomed.

item.name: Glass Golem
item.flavorText: Izzet artificers have learned to steer their beautiful constructs clear of Boros warhammers—and the opera house.

item.name: Golgari Signet
item.text: {1}, {T}: Add {B}{G} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.

item.name: Grifter's Blade
item.text: Flash As Grifter's Blade enters the battlefield, choose a creature you control it could be attached to. If you do, it enters the battlefield attached to that creature. Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Equip {1}

item.name: Junktroller
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {T}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
item.flavorText: One man's trash is another man's troller.

item.name: Leashling
item.text: Put a card in your hand on top of your library: Return Leashling to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: Constructed of leather and irony.

item.name: Nullstone Gargoyle
item.text: Flying Whenever the first noncreature spell of a turn is cast, counter that spell.
item.flavorText: Nullstone absorbs and dampens most forms of magical energy, as well as light, sound, and heat.

item.name: Pariah's Shield
item.text: All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to equipped creature instead. Equip {3}
item.flavorText: To bear the shield of the pariah is the highest honor a Boros can receive—and the last.

item.name: Peregrine Mask
item.text: Equipped creature has defender, flying, and first strike. Equip {2}
item.flavorText: The mask confers both the prowess of a falcon and its loyalty.

item.name: Plague Boiler
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a plague counter on Plague Boiler. {1}{B}{G}: Put a plague counter on Plague Boiler or remove a plague counter from it. When Plague Boiler has three or more plague counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, destroy all nonland permanents.

item.name: Selesnya Signet
item.text: {1}, {T}: Add {G}{W} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: The symbol of the Conclave is one of unity, with tree supporting sun and sun feeding tree.

item.name: Spectral Searchlight
item.text: {T}: Choose a player. That player adds one mana of any color he or she chooses to his or her mana pool.
item.flavorText: The first searchlights were given as gifts, symbols of cooperation, to the emissaries present at the signing of the Guildpact.

item.name: Sunforger
Terrarion
item.text: Terrarion enters the battlefield tapped. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Terrarion: Add two mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool. When Terrarion is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

item.name: Voyager Staff
item.text: {2}, Sacrifice Voyager Staff: Exile target creature. Return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
item.flavorText: Voyager staffs are sought by those hoping to find an escape from the sprawling glut of Ravnica.

item.name: Boros Garrison
item.text: Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped. When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}{W} to your mana pool.

item.name: Dimir Aqueduct
item.text: Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield tapped. When Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{B} to your mana pool.

item.name: Duskmantle, House of Shadow
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {U}{B}, {T}: Target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
item.flavorText: In a space where there is no room, in a structure that was never built, meets the guild that doesn't exist.

item.name: Golgari Rot Farm
item.text: Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield tapped. When Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{G} to your mana pool.

item.name: Overgrown Tomb
item.text: ({T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.) As Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield tapped.

item.name: Sacred Foundry
item.text: ({T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.) As Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield tapped.

item.name: Selesnya Sanctuary
item.text: Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped. When Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {G}{W} to your mana pool.

item.name: Sunhome, Fortress of the Legion
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {2}{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Sunhome—the stalwart shield, the towering sentinel, the seat of justice.

item.name: Svogthos, the Restless Tomb
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {3}{B}{G}: Until end of turn, Svogthos, the Restless Tomb becomes a black and green Plant Zombie creature with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard." It's still a land.

item.name: Temple Garden
item.text: ({T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.) As Temple Garden enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Temple Garden enters the battlefield tapped.

item.name: Vitu-Ghazi, the City-Tree
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {2}{G}{W}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: In the autumn, she casts her seeds across the streets below, and come spring, her children rise in service to the Conclave.

item.name: Watery Grave
item.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.) As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Watery Grave enters the battlefield tapped.
